name: Untitled
description: Redefining luxury beauty by creating high quality products at affordable prices. We pride ourselves on being cruelty-free, wallet-friendly, and keeping our customers at the center of our world. Made in the USA, we imagine, innovate, test, and manufacture all under one roof.

products.title: Mini Duo Fiber Face Brush
products.body_html: Amazing for blending concealer or diffusing a highlight, this mini fluffy brush can be used with Super Shock, liquid, cream, or powder formulas.

products.title: Champagne Blonde Pencil
products.body_html: Cool blonde

products.title: Just A Kiss
products.body_html:
Pink lippies? Say less.

This stunning set features a range of 10 iconic pinks for every occasion in flattering Matte, Matte X and Crème finishes. Find your new all-time faves with our long-lasting formula for a pop of rich colour. Each finish is infused with a nourishing blend of Vitamin E + creamy Shea, Mango and Avocado Butters.

products.title: Rose Goals
products.body_html:
Soft, dreamy, and effortlessly chic – the Rose Goals Trio is here to romanticize your everyday glam. This curated trio of creamy, easy-to-apply shadow sticks is perfect to create soft glam looks in seconds - no brushes needed. This bundle is riding the wave of cozy, wearable neutrals with a feminine twist. Perfect for bridal season, date night or that clean girl energy.

Shades Included:

Socialite – A luminous champagne beige with a shimmer finish.

Next Spot – A glowing pink-mauve shimmer that brings warmth and romance to any eye look.

Plum Tart – A rich matte rose-brown that defines and deepens with ease.

products.title: Triple Chocolate
products.body_html:
Calling all chocolate lovers with this yummy lip trio!

Fresh Kiss Lip Scrub - This yummy, exfoliating lip scrub gently removes dry, flaky skin for soft, smooth lips. Superfine Sugar Crystals buff away dead skin cells while lip-loving ingredients nourish and condition. It also preps your pout for the smoothest lipstick application ever! Infused with moisturizing Cupuaçu Butter, softening Shea Butter and nourishing Vitamin E.

Fresh Kiss Lip Mask - This yummy, hydrating lip mask replenishes and locks in lasting moisture for soft, kissable lips. Its cushiony texture melts onto lips and delivers nourishing ingredients for a plump, pillowy pout with a glossy glow. Infused with moisturizing Raspberry Seed Oil, vitamin-rich Cloudberry Oil and softening Shea Butter.

Fresh Kiss Glossy Lip Balm – This plush, ultra-cushiony formula drenches lips with a glossy finish and a hint of colour. Infused with Peptides to soften and nourish lips and Hyaluronic Acid to deeply hydrate.

Set Includes:

  • Fresh Kiss Lip Scrub in Chocolate Milkshake

  • Fresh Kiss Lip Mask in Chocolate Milkshake

  • Fresh Kiss Glossy Lip Balm in Chocolate Milkshake

products.title: Rainbow Rush
products.body_html:
Wear the rainbow with our monochromatic palette set!

With 6 palettes, create endless looks with peaches, nudes, pinks, greens, blues and purples - that’s 54 shades total! Featuring our pigmented, velvety smooth formula that blends like a dream.

Set Includes:

Feelin' Toasty Eyeshadow Palette

Cloud Spun Eyeshadow Palette

Baby Got Peach Eyeshadow Palette

Blue Moon Eyeshadow Palette

Just My Luck Eyeshadow Palette

It's My Pleasure Eyeshadow Palette

products.title: Transform
products.body_html:
A pH-powered lip balm inspired by Ditto that changes colour into a custom pink shade made just for you! Lip-loving ingredients nourish your pout while the colour-changing formula reacts to your natural pH to add a hint of pink. Swipe on this exclusive lip balm infused with multi-pearl flakes for lips that pop!

PRODUCTS ARE NOT AVAILABLE TO SHIP TO MAINLAND CHINA, TAIWAN, HONG KONG SAR, AND MACAO SAR. FOR A FULL LIST, SEE OUR FAQ.

products.title: Summer Mystery Box
products.body_html: Want a summer glow up? This limited-edition mystery box includes 9 full-size items worth over $90 for the perfect glowy glam! Whether you're gifting it to your bestie or keeping it for yourself, this box is packed with eye, lip, palette and more goodies you'll love!

products.title: Pencil Sharpener
products.body_html: Your Lippie Pencil's new BFF! Never get caught with a dull pencil again, this essential tool will effortlessly sharpen and fine tune for the most precise tip ever. Line it up baby!

products.title: Pack Member
products.body_html:
Get both Twilight New Moon Lip Kits plus our Ultra Glossy Lip!

Bella! Where the Hell Have You Been, Loca? Lip Kit - A limited-edition matte brown lip combo inspired by Jacob featuring Lippie Pencil and Power Pout Transfer-Proof 8HR Lipstick.

You Can’t Trust Vampires Lip Kit - A limited-edition matte vampy red lip combo inspired by The Volturi featuring Lippie Pencil and Power Pout Transfer-Proof 8HR Lipstick.

Ultra Glossy Lip in Runs with Vampires - A hi-shine, smoothing (never sticky) gloss infused with Hyaluronic Acid in a pearlized finish inspired by Twilight New Moon.

products.title: Bloodsuckers
products.body_html:
Get both Twilight New Moon Super Shock Shadows!

Our famous OG crème-to-powder formula delivers supercharged sparkling colour in new shades inspired by Twilight New Moon. One swipe of this long-lasting shadow is all you need to get high impact colour with minimal creasing, fading or fallout. Its unique bouncy texture is super creamy and insanely pigmented to take any look to the next level.

products.title: Bratz x ColourPop Full Collection
products.body_html:
Bratz 4ever.

👡 Girls Nite Out Eyeshadow Palette - Xpress yourself with 15 it-girl shades inspired by the four iconic Bratz in Matte, Metallic Matte Sparkle and Pearlescent Glitter finishes!

📀 BFF Liquid Liner - Create the perfect cat eye with our precision felt tip liquid eyeliner for looks with total bratitude.

💋 So Juicy Plumping Gloss – Get a juicy Bratz pout with our OG plumping lip gloss with the ultimate high shine finish. Plus it features holographic star glitter inside!

👄 Lippie Kits - It’s giving Bratz with our Lippie Pencil + Lippie Stix Kits in a throwback Pearlized finish inspired by Cloe, Jade, Yasmin and Sasha!

🦋 Glitterally Obsessed – Have a passion 4 fashion with Bratz-inspired shades that are easy-to-use + mess-free.

💫 Individual Hair & Face Crystals – Be bling’d out with this sheet of self-adhesive iridescent crystals to Bratzify any look!

products.title: Yasmin
products.body_html: Channel your inner Yasmin with this plummy brown lip combo 🤎

products.title: Sasha
products.body_html: A pink lip combo for lips like Sasha’s 💋

products.title: Jade
products.body_html: Get Jade’s pout with this red wine lip combo 🍷
